long_description: Simple yet elegant for urban commutes, the Alite waxed-canvas Shifter Pack features a padded laptop sleeve with side zipper, a roll top that can hold extra clothes, and a mesh back for comfort. Made of lightweight, water-resistant waxed nylon-canvas with padded straps and a mesh back. Expanded roll-top adds room for extras. Super comfy shoulder straps have reflectors; fabric loop holds a bike light (sold separately). Side access zipper to padded laptop sleeve; sleeve can be used for a hydration bladder. Luggage-style grip handle for convenience. Alite Shifter Pack has a safety whistle integrated into the sternum strap. Closeout.
short_description: Simple yet elegant for urban commutes, the Alite waxed-canvas Shifter Pack features a padded laptop sleeve with side zipper, a roll top that can hold extra clothes, and a mesh back for comfort.
